TopicTitle: Can't Tell which mod hangs game on rocket launch

Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.90 Windows 32bit

Problem: Game crashes on launching rocket (as in launch button from editor)

Mods installed:

Deadly Reentry

DebRefund

FAR

KerbalEngineer

Procedural Fairings

SmartStage

Module Manager 2.5.6

(all mods were downloaded from official sites today, [apart from module manager, that came with one of the mods kerbal engineer i think])

Reproduction steps:

Launch vehicle

The UI is loaded and some what working but screen is black with rocket in middle small (or zoomed out far) and constantly firing, also rotated 90 deg to face the left.

Don't believe it's a specific part because i made rocket that was just the mk1 pod and stock solid booster and still crashed.

I tried to read the log file, but i couldn't understand it

Note : line 9840 is "Scene Change : From EDITOR to FLIGHT (Async)"

there is one other exception before this point, but the editor seemed fine in game

Log:

Output_log.txt

Thanks for any help,

Lars

Maybe try kerbal engineer? All I have to go on is that it's the last one in the output log. You don't have very many, so you could take out one at a time to see if removing it works.

Also check the pages for the mods for any known conflicts.

DebRefund?! Man, that broke in 0.25, certainly not working in 0.90... 20 quid says that's your problem, mate.

EDIT: If DebRefund is removed and the problem is still there, I'd go for SmartStage - I have the others and haven't experienced your problem

Edited January 9, 2015 by ObsessedWithKSP
Thanks for the tip abkit debrefund, thought I had checked that they are all .90 compatible. That one must have slipped through, I'll check and report back when I get home thanks.
